english.segment1: Hey, it's me again. Just the one I didn't want to see. A confrontation I would rather avoid.
english.segment2: It's in my skin always tryin' to trip me up from within. I checked with me I think I'm getting annoyed.
english.segment3: What do I want from me, my eyes are wide but my mind is blurry, overshaken I'm just fading away.
english.segment4: What did I want to see, a little more junk for my flesh to feed on, overshaken I'm just fading away. Here I am rollin' round the dirt again.
english.segment5: It's just the kind of pain I like to endure. But, when I fall and make myself sick again, there's always One that's there to give the cure.
english.segment6: What do I want from me, my eyes are wide but my mind is blurry, overshaken I'm just fading away.
english.segment7: What did I want to see, a little more junk for my flesh to feed on, overshaken I'm just fading away. Hey, it's me again. Just the one I didn't want to see, but everywhere I go I'm already there.
english.segment8: What do I want from me, my eyes are wide but my mind is blurry, overtaken I'm just fading away. What did I want to see, a little more junk for my flesh to feed on, overtaken I'm just fading away.
